name: Finding Keys 2.1
description:
A Horror Game where you have to find all the keys before time runs out. There is no light except yours, but watch out! Using the light will make you one step closer to the danger. Will you reach the exit in time? The rhythm of the drums is getting faster and something is coming for you...

Patch Notes

Gameplay

  • Randomized Key Generation
  • 3 Difficulties
  • New Ending

Graphic Update

  • URP (Universal Render Pipeline) implemented
  • New Icon
  • New Ambiental Elements
  • Restilized Old Elements
  • New Menù, Intro and GUI

Other

  • Sound fixing
  • New Contacts
  • New Logo

Credits

  • Serena Paolucci: "Burger Brothers" & "Baby Yoda"
  • Ph.rank: "Lost and Broken"
  • Enrico Troccoli: "Mad Doctor"
